# Add a feature to a product in a new subscription

This article explains how to add features to a product within a new subscription by creating the subscription, selecting desired features, and adding them to the product.

![AddSubProdFeature](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/bc1c5887-8c07-40ad-be5a-62d07ef45fa2?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..bieH-AAwP-vKHPxZKhg6hpWVygoaYr47UYn122rhyeg)

To add a feature to a subscription product:

1.  Create a new subscription and add products to the subscription.
2.  In the Product & Charges section, click add features .
3.  Select the features you want to add to this product. If you have many features, use the Search field to narrow your selection. A subscription product rate plan can contain up to 100 features.
4.  Click add selected feature(s).
